entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 13.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
